title: Remember to grab The Sims 4 for free!
body:
Today's the last day and honestly it's a great game to waste hours of you time on. It's just like league but instead of getting upset at your teammates and flaming and getting punished you can get upset at other sims and sabotage their toilets. 

That'll teach that old woman to mess with my knock off my trashcan and steal my mushrooms. 

Plus the perks of the "troll teh forums" feature are nice and reward you for shit posting.
